channel.title: Patent Agreements on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Patent Agreements on FinanClub

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:-26 Chances: Nokia’s 5G patent agreement with Honor demonstrates potential for increased licensing revenue and partnerships with leading smartphone makers. The company’s focus on cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models positions it well for growth in critical networks and communication software. The disinvestment deal to offload non-core businesses indicates a strategic shift towards key growth areas such as SaaS, 5G core, and Network as a Code.
